addr: Station Road. Chingford. London, Gt Lon E4 7EN GB
title: Waltham Forest Through Time: Chingford
desc: The London Borough of Waltham Forest was formed on 1 April 1965, when the three boroughs of Walthamstow, Chingford and Leyton (incorporating Leytonstone) were brought together. To celebrate 50 years of our fabulous borough, Waltham Forest Council has commissioned a series of four books have been written that present an overview of its rich local history from Roman times through to some of our exciting recent developments. Join Lindsay Collier, local historian and author as he delves into the history of each area for a series of talks based on the books. Copies of the books will be available at each event.
